meanings.definition: A type of tobacco pipe made from a soft white clay
meanings.sent1: My grandfather collects meerschaums and displays them in his study.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a beautiful collection of meerschaums for sale.
meanings.sent3: The meerschaums on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: His meerschaum pipe, like a loyal companion, was always by his side.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the meerschaums made them true works of art.
